title: Minister) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 19 of 2023)) and the Minister for Housing, Local
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency 

(Amendment) Act 2014 (Designated Body) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national treasury management agency (amendment) act 2014 (designated body) (no 2) order 2024

title: Minister) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 19 of 2023)) and the Minister for Housing, Local
heading: 2. The Housing Finance Agency shall be a designated body for the purposes
text_raw:
2. The Housing Finance Agency shall be a designated body for the purposes 
of Part 3 of the National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 
(No. 23 of 2014). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 October, 2024. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [583] 3
